title: Slark
author: Slark
created_time: August 28, 2022, 05:14:59 PMLast edit: August 28, 2022, 05:31:53 PM by Slark
content: Kudx.com exchangeKudx.comKudx is a blockchain system and infrastructure provider for the cryptocurrency industry with a range of products including digital asset tradingeducation, research and data, philanthropy, investment and incubation, decentralization and infrastructure solutions, and more.Website: Kudx.comRegister Code: NEW2022One Click to buy crypto with MercuryoOne Click to Buy Coins: Never been easier to buy coinsChoose the fiat you want to pay for, the currency you want to buy, and the third-party service provider, and click the buy buttonVerify your identity information on Kudx and third-party service provider websites, and complete the paymentCheck the coins you bought in Kudx wallet coin financial record, and check Order details in the website of service provider.Copy TradingOver the past decade, and especially over the past few years, the terms "retail trader" or "retail investor" have gained currency and changed the financial world.And we are only at the very beginning of the global revolution. Given this, the ability to copy trades of successful traders to your account (copy trades) has become a real trend among retail traders and investors. Copy trades of experienced traders and get the same results.Daily rewards KudxWe give out daily rewards to both new users and those who have been with us for a long time.Kudx's expands into Asia marketWe cooperate a lot with Asia market!Referral system KudxRefer Friends. Earn Crypto Together.Earn up to 40% commission on every trade.KudX Privacy Policy1.The purpose of this Privacy Policy is to inform you and provide you with an understanding of how KU DIGITAL SOLUTIONS LIMITED (“KudX” or “we” or “us” or “our”) handles, collects, uses, discloses, and deals with personal data about you (“User”) that you give us, that we receive through third parties or that is in our possession. Further, this Privacy Policy governs the manner in which KudX collects, uses, maintains, and/or discloses personal data collected from Users of the KudX website (“Site”). To provide you with our Services, we might need (and sometimes obliged by the law) to collect your personal data.2.We take our responsibilities under the Constitution of the United States of Amerie seriously. We also recognize the importance of the personal datayou have entrusted to us and believe that it is our responsibility to properly manage, protect and process your personal data.3.This privacy policy applies to the Site and all Services offered by KudX.Communities You can join communities on different social networks. To find out what's going on, meet people, discuss, learn new things, share experiences.Here are a few places worth visitinghttps://www.facebook.com/kudXcomhttps://www.reddit.com/r/kudX/https://steemit.com/@kudx!Contact UsSupport Service：support@kudx.comToken Listings：listing@kudx.comBusiness Offers：business@kudx.com

comments.body: even though I haven't been active in Kudx but many of my friends also use Kudx in making transactions, and reviws are good

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Quote from: Padyan on December 10, 2022, 06:30:57 PM<Snipped shill>Quote from: hansonaric on December 11, 2022, 09:51:28 AM<Snipped shill part 2> Your posts don't look suspicious at all, no way. Padyan registers an account on December 10, 2022, at 06:23:11 PM and goes directly to this thread to post at 06:30:57 PM the same day.hansonaric was even quicker. He registered today at 09:50:49 AM, and made his post just one minute later - at 09:51:05 AM. I guess it's just coincidence. Amateur hour, the two of you. For your next shill post, may I suggest you create an account well in advance before actually posting from it.
